title: Seyle General Adaptation Syndrome Third Stage

content.question: Which of the following is most likely to occur in the third stage of the general adaptation syndrome?

choices.label: A positive appraisal of the stressor
A mobilization of the bodyâ€™s resources
An increased vulnerability to stress-related illnesses

content.answer: An increased vulnerability to stress-related illnesses

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
